sense.gloss: day on which the temperature reaches at least 25°C

sdata.j: ↑真夏↑↓ま|なつ↓↑日↑↓び|↓には↑屋内↑↓おくない↓にひっこんで↑太陽↑↓たいよう↓を↑避↑↓さ↓けるしか↑手↑↓て↓がないよ。
sdata.e: All I want to do during the dog days is stay indoors and keep out of the sun.

sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あした↓は↑真夏↑↓ま|なつ↓↑日↑↓び|↓になりそうだって。
sdata.e: It looks like tomorrow will be a very hot summer day.
